title: Session Cache Invalidation Bug
description: Cache not cleared on logout, causing stale data leak
bug_description: The logout() method in UserSession class fails to clear the internal _cache dictionary. This causes get_user_data() to return stale cached user data even after the user has logged out, which is both a functional bug and a potential security issue.
expected_failure_signal: AssertionError: user data should be None after logout
test_hint: Test the sequence: login -> get_user_data (should have data) -> logout -> get_user_data (should be None, but buggy code returns stale data)
